annonsrubrik: QA engineer to the Platform24 Partner Success Engineering team
annonstext:
About Doktor 24 Group

For most people, healthcare is one of the most important sectors in society. But in many ways, it has been decades behind other sectors in terms of accessibility and productivity. The Doktor24 Group is driving the change in how healthcare works. We are building "Healthcare 2.0" which means that we are, through smart, easy and, sustainable solutions, improving healthcare to ensure the best possible care at the right time in the most suitable format. We are daily working on making it more accessible, efficient with resources, and increasing the quality of care given to patients, while bridging the gap between physical and digital health-care.

Doktor 24 Group is fast-growing and consists of two business areas that work tightly together: Doktor24, a digital integrated caregiver, and Platform24, an innovative health tech company that offers our award-winning platform to many healthcare providers such as several Swedish regions, insurers, and private health care providers. We are fortunate to have Investor AB (publ) and Apoteket AB as two long-term owners.

The role of a QA in the Platform24 Partner Success Engineering team. You will in this role be a key player in a cross-functional team working on our most important projects, assuring the quality in the delivery of our healthcare platform to partners.

The team is working closely with our customers to implement development initiatives and customizations based on customer specific needs, which also more than often ends up being part in the general product offering. The PSE team projects are spanning across our whole platform, owning solutions from architecture to implementation.

We are growing quickly, and are on a global expansion and this role be in the frontline of driving our journey.

What we are looking or

- An agile mindset - and experience of working in agile development teams
- Test methods - You will be working in a versatile environment on different platforms with an agile and pragmatic approach in how to test. However, the experience of following test methods will be a key part of your success successful in this role - regression testing, static testing, solution testing & exploratory testing.
- Ability to work independently - You will be working on several projects simultaneously and you daily utilize your ability to prioritize and manage your own time and work.
- Requirement gathering - You will be part of identifying needs and for the projects, you are involved in interacting with internal stakeholders and customers to do so.
- Communications skills-  You will daily interact with our internal product development teams and external partners to listen and give input for how to move a project forward.
- Swedish fluency - We are an international company with English as our first language but Swedish is a key to success for this role.

Only applicants based in Stockholm will be considered.
